game_description: The flash game masterpiece "War Era", which I enjoyed when I was little, was reborn in VR in line with the times. Whilst making the best use of the characteristics of the original, please play this game uniquely constructed future war now! [Basic mode] Action defense game Enjoy the future war in the most classic way! Collect units to prevent approaching enemies and attack enemy bases to win. [VR mode] We made it by polishing the bones, so I can recommend it with confidence. Play a game that grumpy developers are happy with! Weapons with timely features are confident that your heart will be throbbing. (bang, boom)
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain)
